item.name: 01_Vessels
List All Vessels

request.description: Returns first page of all Vessels known to Spire.

item.name: Get Individual Vessel

request.description: Returns individual ship details.

item.name: List All Cargo Vessels

request.description: Returns all Vessels with the ship type Cargo.

item.name: List All Chinese Cargo Vessels

request.description: Returns all Vessels with the ship type Cargo and with the flag country of China.

item.name: List All Tankers in the North Sea

request.description: Returns all vessels with the ship type Tanker and within a given polygon geometry of the North Sea.

item.name: List All Vessels Last Known in the Indian Ocean

request.description: Returns all vessels with a last known position within a given polygon geometry of the Indian Ocean.

item.name: List All Vessels Predicted or Last Known in the Indian Ocean

request.description: Returns all vessels with a predicted OR last known position within a given polygon geometry of the Indian Ocean.

item.name: List All Vessels Updated After Given Date

request.description: Returns all vessels with an `updated_at` date after the provided date, meaning they have new static or last known position information since that date/time.

item.name: Find Vessels by MMSI List

request.description: Returns all vessels that have an exact match for at least one of the MMSIs provided.

item.name: Find Vessels by IMO List

request.description: Returns all vessels that have an exact match for at least one of the IMO numbers provided.

item.name: Find Vessels Arriving Between Date/Time Window

request.description:
Returns all vessels with an ETA greater than the `arriving_after` and ETA less than the `arriving_before` parameter.

Query can also be used without the `arriving_before` parameter.

item.name: 02_Messages
Most Recent Decoded Messages

request.description: First page of 20,000 results from the previous 3 hours is returned.

item.name: Most Recent Messages for list of MMSIs

request.description: First page of results from the last 3 hours that includes these MMSIs is returned.

item.name: Most Recent Type 1 Messages for AOI in the North Atlantic

request.description: First page of type 1 messages from the last 3 hours for the geometry provided is returned.

item.name: All Messages from Date/Time Window

request.description:
Returns all messages with a timestamp greater than `received_after` and timestamp less than `received_before`.
Query can also be used without the `received_before` parameter.
Timestamp must be within the past 7 days.

item.name: 03_PredictAI
List All Vessels w/ Predicted Future Positions

request.description: Returns first page of all Vessels known to Spire and their predicted future positions.

item.name: List All Fishing Vessels w/ Predicted Future Positions

request.description: Returns first page of all Vessels with the ship type Fishing and their predicted future positions.

item.name: List All US Tanker Vessels w/ Predicted Future Positions

request.description: Returns all Vessels with the ship type Tanker and the flag country of the United States, along with their future predicted positions.

item.name: List All Cargo Vessels Predicted or Last Known in the South China Sea w/ Predicted Future Positions

request.description: Returns all vessels with the ship type Cargo and last known or currently predicted within a given polygon geometry of the South China Sea, along with their future predicted positions.

item.name: List Predicted Future Positions for All Class B Vessels

request.description: Returns first page of predicted future positions for Class B vessels.

item.name: List Predicted Future Positions by IMO List

request.description: Returns predicted future poisitions for vessels that have an exact match for at least one of the IMO numbers provided.

item.name: List Predicted Future Positions by MMSI List

request.description: Returns predicted future positions for vessels that have an exact match for at least one of the MMSIs provided.
